name: Knight on the run!
description:
Short platormer made in Construct where you control a knight and must go through all 5 levels to reach the exit.

---

Controls
Movement: Arrow Keys / WASD
Melee attack: Space / LMB
Ranged attack: RMB (Only in the arena level)

Dev note: This is the first game I have made. I tried to fix most of the bugs, but I am sure that I missed a few, so let me know if you find any!

Credits
